definition: to save money
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
surname Qian

sentences.english: The time is the money, Fengyin economizes for you.
sentences.chinese: 時間就是金錢，豐銀爲您省錢。

sentences.english: The city council is axing recycling facilities in order to save money.
sentences.chinese: 市政會爲了省錢正在削減廢物回收利用設施。

sentences.english: John had his sods education in view when he began to save money.
sentences.chinese: 約翰省錢的目的是爲使他的兒子受教育。

sentences.english: What are your favorite ways to save money while traveling?
sentences.chinese: 哪種旅遊省錢貼士最合你心意呢？

sentences.english: If you are looking to save money on the catering than why not host a BBQ on the Evening Dresses.
sentences.chinese: 想在婚禮上省錢，爲何不穿晚禮服舉辦一場BBQ。

sentences.english: Is it money-saving or life-risking to sleep on the hammock under the container-truck?
sentences.chinese: 女子在貨櫃車底掛吊牀睡覺，省錢還是玩命？

sentences.english: Many students save money by starting their education at a two-year public college, also known as a community college.
sentences.chinese: 許多學生爲了省錢通常先就讀兩年制的社區學院。

sentences.english: The day after, I'll carpool to save money.
She saves money in every way she can.
sentences.chinese: 她在各方面儘可能地省錢。

sentences.english: Much of this greenery could also save money.
sentences.chinese: 多數情況下這種醫療保健的綠化方式亦可以省錢。

sentences.english: Experts say that while rotational grazing can save money over time , it also requires planning.
sentences.chinese: 專家稱，雖然輪牧經濟省錢，它也需要周密籌劃。

sentences.english: One New Jersey man decided to paint the exterior of his house to save money.
sentences.chinese: 新澤西有位仁兄爲了省錢，決定自己粉刷屋子的外牆。
我們不能從這些上面省錢。

sentences.english: Don't miss this opportunity to save.
sentences.chinese: 別錯過這個省錢的機會。

sentences.english: You might save money or even prevent the problem of a missing refund check .
sentences.chinese: 你可能省錢的問題，甚至防止失蹤退票檢查。

sentences.english: And Macs can save you money over time.
sentences.chinese: 而且，從長遠看，蘋果電腦能夠幫你省錢。

definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
surname Qian
to spend money
this side/here
free (of charge)
if (coming after a conditional clause)
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
well-off/wealthy
to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
to set off/to start (on a journey)
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
to take the car, bus, train etc
to earn money/moneymaking
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
or/still/nevertheless/had better
